content: meet sunflower the flower gnome the newest addition in our crochet gnome along > you can find the free pattern on the blog click here 1 make yourself an adorable crochet flower gnome easy crochet gnome that is suitable even for beginners perfect as a gift for mother s day easy and quick to make materials worsted weight yarn crochet hook size 3 5/ us hook size e poly fiber fill for stuffing cardboard not necessary 1 https //new free pattern release the crochet sunflower gnome pattern is now live on the blog the waiting is over and the second spring gnome is now here for you to enjoy the are two different ways to crochet this adorable gnome i can t wait to see what variation will you choose happy crocheting and enjoy free pattern here- https //www passionatecrafter com/sunflower-gnome-crochet-garden-gnome-pattern/ 1 https //www passionatecrafter com/sunflower-gnome-crochet-garden-gnome-pattern/
